pullrequest.title: [DRC Expo: foosball] Support for multiple Hydra's

content.raw:
Makes sense but is slightly faster for us to do it in this way because we have more freedom to merge the pull request as long is in a working state.

I'll create a new pull requests targeted to default when we agree that this pull request works :)
